name: BOSSRUSH Battler
description:
A Tough as Nails Adventure Game

Dodge, Roll and Parry your way through 6 Grueling missions defeating Powerful bosses and unlocking new upgrades as you go!

the game currently features 6 levels, 15 items, an online scoreboard and lots of suffering.

THIS GAME IS VERY HARD PLEASE DONT MALD (so mad your balding) TOO HARD!
